remarks: Ring multiplication operation.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
erngset.h-r $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erngset.t-r $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.e-r $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.d-r $e |- D = ( ( EDRingR ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng.m-r $e |- .x. = ( .r ` D ) $.
erngfmul-rN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( t o. s ) ) ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d K s t $.
$d W s t $.
